attributes.additional_details:
The government should discuss wether the English FA should withdraw from the 2022 World Cup.

Background;

A corrupt organisation has manipulated the application process for hosting the World Cup. We the people, will suffer the consequences.

Christmas, a time traditionally important for families, the season of goodwill, work parties and other festivities is now going to be pushed aside so they can keep thier bribes. Not too mention the havoc for leagues the world over.

By all means slip it a few months but protect Christmas.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Football Association only.
